name: ShitBrick-Tool
tagline: It shits bricks and is free and open-source = awesome. No, read the overview description.
body:
# ShitBrick-Tool

## Overview
_A simple console-based tool that checks for the "DevComponents.DotNetBar2.dll" file and if that dynamic link library is not present on you machine it will be downloaded. This is a temporary tool to fix the problem with all of Deavmi's apps (because I always use DotNetBar2)._

## Downloads

###Application

### Latest stable build

_Automated version of the ShitBrick-Tool_

* [Download ShitBrick-Tool v1.0.0.0](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/releases/download/v1.0.0.0-automated/ShitBrick.Tool.exe)

_Manual version of the ShitBrick-Tool_

* [Download ShitBrick-Tool v1.0.0.6](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/releases/download/v1.0.0.6/ShitBrick.Tool.exe)

### Older unstable builds

_Manual version of the ShitBrick-Tool_

* [Download ShitBrick-Tool v1.0.0.0](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/releases/download/v1.0.0.0/ShitBrick.Tool.exe)
* [Download ShitBrick-Tool v1.0.0.2](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/releases/download/v1.0.0.2/ShitBrick.Tool.exe)
* [Download ShitBrick-Tool v1.0.0.3](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/releases/download/v1.0.0.3/ShitBrick.Tool.exe)
* [Download ShitBrick-Tool v1.0.0.4](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/releases/download/v1.0.0.4/ShitBrick.Tool.exe)
* [Download ShitBrick-Tool v1.0.0.5](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/releases/download/V1.0.0.5/ShitBrick.Tool.exe)

**NOTICE:** We skipped v1.0.0.1 because I forgot to update version number in that release. Therefore that kinda' counts. Yah.

### Source code

To download the latest source code please [click this link](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/zipball/master). Default format is ".ZIP" but you may choose to download a ".TAR" version of the source code [here](https://github.com/deavmi/ShitBrick-Tool/tarball/master).
